Text.Page:
I need to investigate this Ceremony of Blessing, but I can't get past the throngs of vampirs.

If you could even get rid of the {@LinkCreature:16#2403#vampir runners} and {@LinkCreature:16#2404#vampir soldiers} in the mansion garden, that would help.

When you're done, report to Segodunâ€”he's already in the garden.

Made it through, I see. Good job!

Take this for the work you've put in.
